      • ImageCache

        public ImageCache(@NonNull
                  Font font,
                  int duration)
        Constructs a new ImageCache.
        Parameters:
        font - The font.
        duration - The number of minutes, after the most recent access, that a cached image will be removed from the cache.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the font is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - If the duration is below 1.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveFromCache

        public VolatileImage retrieveFromCache(@NonNull
                                       AsciiCharacter character)
        Retrieves a character image from the cache. If no image could be found, then one is created, inserted into the cache, and then returned.
        Parameters:
        character - The character.
        Returns:
        The character image.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the character is null.

      • totalCachedImages

        public long totalCachedImages()
        Returns:
        The total number of cached images.

      • loadIntoCache

        public VolatileImage loadIntoCache(@NonNull
                                   AsciiCharacter character)
        Loads a character into the cache.
        Parameters:
        character - The character.
        Returns:
        The resulting character image.
